Title: Users should effectively be onboarded to the app
Make the API endpoints RESTful
Description: Extend Meteor DDP methods and provide restful API.

Title: Implement sorting and filtering of search results.
Description: After a search is completed, a user should be able to further refine through sorting and filtering. [#277](https://github.com/reactioncommerce/reaction/issues/277)

Title: Display real-time results as shopper is typing.
Description: Similar to a google search, display relevant results on the page as a user is typing rather than wait until they submit the search. [#276](https://github.com/reactioncommerce/reaction/issues/276)

Title: Payment

Title: Embed Social Content
Description: Embed reviews, tweets, and other social content.

Title: Actionable Analytics
Description: Data driven product presentation, and performance analysis.

Title: Static Page Management
Description: Create and edit static pages, such as Contact, About, or Support.

Title: Digital Products
Description: Sell digital goods independently, or mixed with physical goods.
